title: Ticket #97: Email on non-empty output for crondor jobs
description: Feature request from NMI Build & Test (Todd Miller): For Condor cron jobs, add an option to send email with the job’s output each time it runs, but not if the output is empty.
remarks:
2009-Apr-08 13:47:09 by adesmet:
Given the goal of replacing cron with crondor, this seems important. I rely on email output from cron to detect errors (or normal operation in some cases). I can accomplish the same goal with a wrapper script, but that adds complexity.

2009-Apr-08 13:52:37 by adesmet:
Asssuming cron-like behavior is expected, stdout and stderr would need to be interleaved. #326 discusses this possibility.
creator: jfrey
